sentences.sContent: Because these cells are among the largest in the vertebrate brain, they were the first neurons to be identified.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because these cells are among the largest in the vertebrate brain, they were the first neurons to be identified.
sentences.sCn: 由于这些细胞是脊椎动物大脑中最大的细胞，它们是最早被识别出来的神经元。

sentences.sContent: Zoonoses are defined by the WHO as “Any disease or infection which is naturally transmissible from vertebrate animals to man".
sentences.sContent_eng: Zoonoses are defined by the WHO as “Any disease or infection which is naturally transmissible from vertebrate animals to man".
sentences.sCn: 世界卫生组织将人畜共患病定义为“任何自然地从脊椎动物传播到人类的疾病或传染病”。

remMethod.val: verte(=vert转) + brate → 可以灵活转动的 → 有脊柱的

words.tran: 脊椎的；椎骨的；由椎骨组成的；有脊椎的
[解剖] 椎骨；[解剖] 脊椎

trans.tranOther: a living creature that has a backbone
